project_plan.name: Word Frequency Counter in Python
project_plan.description: Develop a Python program that reads a text file and counts the frequency of each word, displaying the top 10 most common words in the terminal.

task.name: Implement functionality to read a text file
Process the text to count the frequency of each word
Sort and identify the top 10 most common words
Display the results in the terminal
Write tests for the reading and processing functions
Execute tests to ensure that the word counting functionality works correctly
